translation: Presenting to this Government the copy of the letter that on the 11th of last month you directed to the citizen Dr. Judge of Law of this District, whom you refused to obey as Chief of Police of the same; and the Government having conformed to the procedure taken by the Commander-in-Chief of the army, ordering that the aforementioned Dr. Judge of Law resume the functions of General Chief of Police of the District, since this provision aligns with the laws of the Empire of Brazil, which we are temporarily following; we order you to be considered dismissed from the aforementioned position of General Chief of Police of this department, which you have so honorably performed: this I communicate to you for your understanding and due execution.
